column5: I am planning to fish Red Cedar Lake north of North Bay Ontario and camp on the lake. Does anyone have info on fishin this lake, where I can put my boat in and park the car & trailer for 3 or 4 days. Thanks.

....Here's a few old posts I dug up on it, may be of some help and a few lodges.  http://www.ofncommunity.com/forums/index.p...ic=7142&hl=  http://www.ofncommunity.com/forums/index.p...mp;#entry166039  http://www.ofncommunity.com/forums/index.p...c=11181&hl=  Temagami Riverside Lodge  Mountain Home Lodge
Theres also www.redcedarlakelodge.com  Im pretty sure hes got camping.
